name: La Culture Physique de la Femme Elégante
name_original: La Culture Physique de la Femme Elégante
description:
A Jazz-age Parisian exercise simulator.

Paris, 1925. The Jazz age is in high swing. Skirts are shorter, hair is bobbed, and freedom of expression has never been better for young liberated women everywhere.

You play as a flapper, going through your morning exercise routine. There are no goals, no stresses, no outside world. Just chill out, listen to some jazz, and do your daily calisthenics.

All of the art was taken from an actual 1920s French book of women's fitness exercises.
